title: Kazuo Ishiguro - 7 Novels - ePub
description:
An Artist of the Floating World
Never Let Me Go
Nocturnes
A Pale View of Hills
The Remains of the Day
The Unconsoled
When We Were Orphans    ........all in ePub format


Kazuo Ishiguro is a British novelist of a Japanese origin. His family moved to England in 1960. Ishiguro obtained his Bachelor's degree from University of Kent in 1978 and his Master's from the University of East Anglia's creative writing course in 1980. He became a British citizen in 1982. He now lives in London. 
Ishiguro received the 1989 Man Booker prize for his third novel The Remains of the Day.
